summary: Srishti C Rai is a Software Engineer specializing in full-stack development with expertise in React, Nest.js, Spring Boot, and AI/ML. With industry experience from Sentinel Group and LG Soft India, she has worked on large-scale applications, automation, and UI/UX improvements. She holds a Master's in Software Engineering Systems from Northeastern University and enjoys hiking, painting, and poetry.
